stories.title: A Brief Rant on the Future of Interaction Design

stories.text:
Hi HN:

Just reaching out to the community to ask if anyone might be able to throw me a few bucks for food, and possibly other needed basics? At the least I am trying to at least secure food to get me through next week.

A few nice people in the community sent me a few bucks, so I am fed until tomorrow, and have some toiletries and new shoes.

I'd like to start programming again. Where I am, which is far from any city, my best path is to get a laptop, a bike, and a coworking membership, then bill time writing software again. I stopped coding years ago, but am sufficiently recharged now.

In the immediate term, I am seeking help from the community to fill in the gap for food until my EBT renews early next month. I am entirely unhoused and charge my phone at the library.

If you can help, can you email me at hackernewscontactmail g'mail? I can accept apple cash, paypal, cashapp, or venmo.

I would love to write code as a 1099 now. But, to do so, I truly need someone to throw me a rope so I can climb out of this hole. A lead on a feasible remote gig and a way to obtain the tools needed fulfill the work would be the most ideal form of help.

If you'd like any more background on me or my situation, or if you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please contact me directly instead of replying here.

Very grateful.
stories.title: Ask HN: Help with food money, basics, maybe a remote dev gig
